name: acuityai
description: AcuityAI: Your Intelligent YouTube Companion . AcuityAI leverages the power of artificial intelligence to bring you an unmatched YouTube experience. Our extension is designed to help you learn more, do more, and connect more deeply with the content you love. Whether you're catching up on lectures, researching for a project, or just watching for fun, AcuityAI is your intelligent companion for every YouTube adventure.
author: Lalit Sharma
